content:
TITLE: Installing Truffle and Ganache Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Command to install global dependencies Truffle and Ganache CLI with specific versions required for the project
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install -g truffle@5.0.41 ganache-cli@6.7.0
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Unpacking OpenZeppelin Starter Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a new starter project using OpenZeppelin CLI unpack command
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
npx @openzeppelin/cli unpack starter
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Local Blockchain
DESCRIPTION: Command to run a local blockchain using Ganache CLI with deterministic addresses
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
ganache-cli --deterministic
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing OpenZeppelin Project
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize the OpenZeppelin project using CLI
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
npx oz init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting React Client
DESCRIPTION: Commands to navigate to client directory and start the React development server
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cd client
npm run start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Truffle Tests
DESCRIPTION: Commands for running Truffle tests both inside and outside the development console
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// inside the development console.
test

// outside the development console..
truffle test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running React Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Starts the React application in development mode, allowing live reloading and displaying lint errors in the console.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/client/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm start
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running React Tests
DESCRIPTION: Command to run Jest tests for React components from the client directory
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// ensure you are inside the client directory when running this
npm run test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running React Test Suite
DESCRIPTION: Launches the test runner in interactive watch mode for running and monitoring tests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/client/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building Production React App
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a production build of the React application in the client/build folder
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// ensure you are inside the client directory when running this
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building React Production Bundle
DESCRIPTION: Builds the React application for production, optimizing and bundling it into the 'build' folder.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/client/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Ejecting from Create React App
DESCRIPTION: Ejects the project from Create React App, exposing all configurations and dependencies for full control. This is a one-way operation and should be used with caution.
SOURCE: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/starter-kit/blob/master/client/README.md#2025-04-16_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm run eject
```
